attributes.action: stop selling fireworks to the public,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop selling fireworks to the public,  fireworks should be at organised displays only and only available for sale for 5th November and New Years Eve.

We have fireworks going off during the day which is pointless as you cannot even see them, they go off all year round, they are thrown at cars, upset animals etc.  It's time that they are only sold to people who intend to use them for a firework display only.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
